alert.note: Alert for Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 25 at 12:56AM PST until February 25 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph. * WHERE...Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands, Los Angeles County Beaches, Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles and Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Secure outdoor objects such as lawn furniture.

area.areaDesc: Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley
